ya3.1.2:2.1_0: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṁ. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:5.1_0: Dibbasotaṁ taṇhāsotaṁ sotaṁ, na sotāyatanaṁ. Sotāyatanaṁ sotañceva sotāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:12.1_0: Kāyāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo, na kāyāyatanaṁ. Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyo ceva kāyāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:15.1_0: Rūpāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ rūpaṁ, na rūpāyatanaṁ. Rūpāyatanaṁ rūpañceva rūpāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:20.1_0: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:23.1_0: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso, na rasāyatanaṁ. Rasāyatanaṁ raso ceva rasāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:30.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṁ. Dhammāyatanaṁ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:34.1_1: Cakkhuñca cakkhāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva cakkhu na ca cakkhāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:37.1_1: Sotañca sotāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva sotaṁ na ca sotāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:44.1_0: Kāyāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na kāyāyatanaṁ, kāyo.
ya3.1.2:44.1_1: Kāyañca kāyāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva kāyo na ca kāyāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:47.1_0: Rūpāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na rūpāyatanaṁ, rūpaṁ.
ya3.1.2:47.1_1: Rūpañca rūpāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva rūpaṁ na ca rūpāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:52.1_0: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho na gandhāyatanaṁ, gandho.
ya3.1.2:52.1_1: Gandhañca gandhāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva gandho na ca gandhāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:55.1_0: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso na rasāyatanaṁ, raso.
ya3.1.2:55.1_1: Rasañca rasāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva raso na ca rasāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:62.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na dhammāyatanaṁ, dhammo.
ya3.1.2:62.1_1: Dhammañca dhammāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dhammo na ca dhammāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:64.1_0: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṁ. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:66.1_0: Sotāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva sotāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na sotāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:68.1_0: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṁ. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:70.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva dhammāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:71.1_0: Sotaṁ sotāyatananti? …pe… Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṁ …pe….
ya3.1.2:73.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṁ. Dhammāyatanaṁ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:75.1_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva cakkhāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na cakkhāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:77.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṁ. Dhammāyatanaṁ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:79.1_0: Manāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva manāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na manāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:87.1_0: Nāyatanā na cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe… nāyatanā na dhammāyatananti? Āmantā.
ya3.1.2:94.1_0: Nāyatanā na sotāyatanaṁ …pe… nāyatanā na manāyatananti? Āmantā.
ya3.1.2:98.1_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva cakkhāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na cakkhāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:100.1_0: Āmantā …pe… ghānaṁ … jivhā … kāyo … rūpaṁ … saddo … gandho … raso … phoṭṭhabbo … mano …
ya3.1.2:103.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva dhammāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:105.1_0: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na cakkhu, āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:105.1_1: Cakkhuñca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:108.1_0: Sotaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… ghānaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… jivhaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:116.1_0: Manaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na mano, āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:116.1_1: Manañca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva mano na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:122.1_0: Sotāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva sotāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na sotāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:125.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva dhammāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:129.1_0: Āyatanā cakkhāyatananti? …pe… Āyatanā dhammāyatananti? …pe… Na dhammāyatanaṁ …pe….
ya3.1.2:132.1_0: Manāyatanaṁ āyatanañceva manāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na manāyatanaṁ.
ya3.1.2:135.1_0: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na cakkhu, āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:135.1_1: Cakkhuñca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:138.1_0: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na cakkhu, āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:138.1_1: Cakkhuñca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:139.1_0: Nāyatanā na ghānāyatanaṁ …pe… nāyatanā na dhammāyatananti? Āmantā.
ya3.1.2:141.1_0: Sotaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… ghānaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… jivhaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:144.1_0: Nāyatanā na cakkhāyatananti? Āmantā. …pe…. Nāyatanā na dhammāyatananti? Āmantā. …pe….
